description:
'''Rosario del Carmen González Flores''' (born 4 November 1963), better known as '''Rosario Flores''' ({{IPA|es|roˈsaɾjo ˈfloɾes}}), is a two-time [[Latin Grammy Award]]-winning Spanish singer and actress.

She was born in Madrid, Spain, as the daughter of Antonio González ('El Pescaílla') and singer [[Lola Flores]]. She is the sister of singer [[Lolita Flores]] and singer-songwriter [[Antonio Flores]].
